item.description:
This is the inaugural meeting of the Interfaith Book Club and its first members. We will come together to explore the relationship between spirituality of the great faiths of the world the global human agenda, issues in the world today where faith and life intersect.

We will discuss the book of the month and choose a book list for the next three meetings, so please come prepared with suggestions. Young adults and older of all faiths are welcome.
item.name: The Interfaith Book Club September Meetup
